org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io.comp

Class FieldComparator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io.comp.StreamComparator
      • org.apache.solr.client.solrj.io.comp.FieldComparator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparator<Tuple>, ExpressibleComparator

    public class FieldComparator
extends StreamComparator
implements Comparator<Tuple>, ExpressibleComparator, Serializable
    An equality field Comparator which compares a field of two Tuples and determines sort order.
    See Also:
